name: Khryse_dd17
description:
This is an extremely work in progress build, i pretty much had no time to put into a proper tutorial and designing a demo level.

However, i've made changes to every aspect of movement and combat.

Please read the following CONTROLS:

WSAD for movement;

Space for jumping, double jumping and airstrafing (WSAD+Space while in air);

C to slide while running;

F to GRAPPLE when the orb on your back is green;

Hold SHIFT while on wall to wallrun up or to the side;

Hold RMB and aim at the surface to swing from it (you can add some inpu with WSAD while swinging);

LMB and E for punching; LMB,LMB,LMB,LMB or E,E,E,E will yield different combos;
CAPS LOCK to lock-on;
